results.title: Inverse Association between Metformin and Amiodarone-Associated Extracardiac Adverse Events
results.text_hl: Therefore, the association between @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Hyperthyroidism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006980 @@@hyperthyroidism@@@ remains unclear.

results.title: Thyrotropin suppression by metformin.
results.text_hl: Should these findings be confirmed in larger prospective studies, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@'s ability to suppress TSH without causing clinical or chemical @<m>DISEASE_Hyperthyroidism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006980 @@@hyperthyroidism@@@ might render this drug a useful adjunct to the treatment of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Thyroid_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D013964 @@@thyroid cancer@@@.

results.title: Metformin-induced thyrotropin suppression is not associated with cardiac effects.
results.text_hl: ...OBJECTIVE: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ treatment may induce a decrease/suppression in serum TSH levels, mimicking sub-clinical @<m>DISEASE_Hyperthyroidism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006980 @@@hyperthyroidism@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Hyperthyroidism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006980 @@@SHT@@@).

results.title: The effect of metformin on the hypothalamic-pituitary-thyroid axis in patients with type 2 diabetes and subclinical hyperthyroidism.
